title: Bianxing Jingche Po Li Xiaofang Anquan Pian
title_japanese: 变形警车珀利 消防安全篇
synopsis: The small town of Blooms where the Transformed Police Car Purley Rescue Team is located, is home to a group of children who are the trickster Bit, the best friend Johnny, the temperamental Cindy, and the timid model student Charles. They play happily in the small town and take risks together. However, children's happy and worry-free daily life is always entrenched with various fire safety hazards. At home, school, amusement parks, mountains and forests, there are always dangers. At this time, the rescue hero Roy, who guarded our safety, stepped forward and worked hard to rescue. Because Roy and the rescue team are there, Blooms Town is full of vitality and happiness! (translated from youku)
